name: TDD
description: An interactive platform that combines gaming, education, and real-world impact to make wildlife conservation accessible to everyone. üêæ Allows users to create their own universe and populate it with their favorite animal companions. name: 2D Dodo Game
description: Dodo Survival is a 2D game showcasing skills in DOM manipulation, HTML, and CSS. Players control a dodo bird to: Dodge predators and collect points, answer fun trivia about dodo birds, pick up stones for extra points, and grab special items to unlock powers that help in the game.
